availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1862-1863

body.p:
Salyerville
Magoffin County Kentucky
Mr J. B. Monre Secatary of State Dear Sir I here inclose the Securtificates of Election of Justices of the peace in the County of Magoffin and I disire the Commisions Sent by way of Catlettsburgh Mouth of Big Sandy Ky and Hallaway Power County Judge has not received his Commision yet who was Elected last august as mail Soon Stoped after that time and Exspect the post offices have bean Robed and I desire his Commision would be processed on with the Balance and oblige yours Truly

Wallis Baley C M C C
Magoffin Co
Justices
Coms Issd May 20. 1863
